item.title: Third Year After Work
item.description: 写在工作后的第三年 不长不短，三年。道家说，三是生数，可生万物。于是，我也希冀这是一个美好的开端，韶韶岁月余下的有限个三年的开端。 有点过于矫情

item.title: About
item.description: Education Master - Unversity at Buffalo - 2014⁄2016, Buffalo Bachelor - Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications - 2010⁄2014, Beijing Experience Senior Software Engineer - Apple - 2017, Cupertino Software Engineer - 4Info - 2016, San Mateo Software Intern - University of Rochester - 2015, Rochester Software Intern - App Annie - 2014, Beijing Research Assistant – Tsinghua University – 2013, Beijing
